title: The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly.
body:
The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly.
why is this happening please someone help {{champion:32}}

replies.body: Happening for me, too... any idea what's happening? The OCE server status says the Store is online...{{champion:32}}
Same issue here on my main, not my lower level accounts
Having the same problem as well only on this account though. Highly annoying as i cant buy  anything through any means on my main account :(
I am having this issue too, but -only- on my main account. My other accounts can connect (all OCE).
Are your original account and new account on the same region?
only happens on my new account not my old one
Ran a repair on my client and it's working again.
